## Preparation

```{r}
#| label: preparation
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

## data
bikes <-
  read_csv(
    here::here("data", "london-bikes.csv"),
    col_types = "Dcfffilllddddc"
  )

## plot style
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_family = "Asap SemiCondensed", base_size = 18))
theme_update(
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_rect(fill = NA, color = NA)
)
```
